title: Manage Custom Authorities
description: Create, update, or delete custom authorities for your account to define granular permissions for specific operations.
errorFetchAuthorities: Failed to fetch custom authority details.
noExistingAuthorities: No custom authorities found for this account.
enabledDescription: If unchecked, this authority cannot be used, even if valid.
operationTypeDescription: The specific blockchain operation this authority applies to.
weightThresholdDescription: Minimum total weight required from included auths to authorize.
accountSearchDescription: Find an account to add to the authorizations.
argumentDescription: The value required by the restriction type.
errorAmountOutOfRange: Amount is outside the valid int64 range.
restrictionsToRemoveDescription: Enter the index numbers (starting from 0) of existing restrictions to remove.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete custom authority {{id}}? This action cannot be undone.
errorFormatting: Failed to prepare transaction data. Check arguments.
errorAuthMissing: Authorization configuration is invalid or missing.
errorOriginalAuthMissing: Cannot find original authority for update.
errorNothingToUpdate: No changes were specified for the update operation.
